headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://apis.google.com https://accounts.google.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://accounts.google.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; frame-src 'self' https://accounts.google.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://content.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://vercel.live; connect-src 'self' wss: *.google.com *.googleapis.com *.firebaseio.com *.firebaseapp.com blob:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; media-src 'self' blob: https:;
